## Visit Us

The ECLIPSE Lab is located in the **Interdisciplinary Center for Nanostructured Films** at the Friedrich-Alexander Universität Erlangen-Nürnberg.

> **Street Address:** Cauerstr. 3, 91058 Erlangen
>
> **Visitor Parking:** Cauerstr. 3, 91058 Erlangen
